description: Building EV charging infrastructure and smart hardware solutions for Africa's clean energy transition. Developing platforms for charging station management, vehicle sales, and service operations.

Software agency building solutions for multiple clients including forecourt automation and therapy consultation platforms. Architected reusable frontend frameworks and component libraries used across client projects.
Led frontend engineering teams building EV charging station management platform serving multiple providers. Delivered admin dashboards, customer portals, and real-time monitoring systems.

Built e-commerce workflow automation platform integrating payment processing, shipping logistics, and inventory management. Developed custom CMS for merchants to manage storefronts and products. Built and maintained open-source UI library for apps.
Built Chrome extension to enhance customer interaction with project issues. Initiated redesign of company website and redesigned Playa Hotels and Resorts website.
Developed team collaboration platform with task tracking, messaging, and calendar scheduling. Built cross-platform desktop application with real-time data synchronization.

Created geospatial, geosocial, and geocivic software solutions to connect and empower communities. Built products from scratch with user-friendly UI designs and contributed to in-house component library. Implemented event monitoring schema for data-driven feature prioritisation.
